document_data.name: Hastar Biggs
document_data.mainbody: '''Hastar Biggs''' was a relative of [[Grindo Biggs]], a [[Gondian]] foundry worker who lived in the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Hastar was a [[gnome]] with a light skin tone, handsome face, light blue eyes and light brown hair and trimmed beard.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, a group of Gondians was put to work at the [[Steel Watch Foundry]] in Baldur's Gate against their will, forced into slave labor by Lord [[Enver Gortash]] and his [[Cultists of Bane]]. One of the two motivations for the slaves' compliance was the fact that the Gondians' family members were abducted and held hostage within the drowned [[Iron Throne headquarters]]. Hastar Biggs was among the cult's hostages. It was unknown if the hostages were rescued before the conclusion of the [[Absolute crisis]], or if the prison was flooded in retaliation for the foundry workers' uprising.
